languages.text: "Я обещала тебе, что наведу порядок на Футфоле, и я исполнила обещание. Благодаря {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}твоей поддержке{/d} станция вновь станет форпостом Империуму — очищенной обителью трудолюбия и праведности. Еретики, что посмели не подчиниться мне, уже практически вытравлены".

"I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."
languages.original_text: "Я обещала тебе, что наведу порядок на Футфоле, и я исполнила обещание. Благодаря {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}твоей поддержке{/d} станция вновь станет форпостом Империуму — очищенной обителью трудолюбия и праведности. Еретики, что посмели не подчиниться мне, уже практически вытравлены".

traits.locale_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of your support, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

"I promised you that I would bring Footfall to heel, and I have made good on that promise. By virtue of your support, the station has long since fallen under my strict control, and the heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

"I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of your support, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

languages.text: “我早就向你保证过会把落脚港清理干净，而我也信守了诺言。在{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}你的正义支持{/d}下，这座星站将会再次成为帝国的前哨站，成为勤劳与正义的纯洁堡垒。至于那些胆敢违抗我的异端分子，几乎已经被我一网打尽了。”
languages.original_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

traits.locale_text: “我早就向你保证过会把落脚港清理干净，而我也信守了诺言。在你的正义支持下，这座星站将会再次成为帝国的前哨站，成为勤劳与正义的纯洁堡垒。至于那些胆敢违抗我的异端分子，几乎已经被我一网打尽了。”

languages.text: 「フットフォールを浄化すると、お前に約束した。そしてその約束は守った。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}お前の支持{/d}のお陰で、ステーションは再び帝国の前哨基地となり、勤勉と正義の純粋なる砦となるだろう。逆らおうとした異端者は、最後の一人まで全滅させた」
languages.original_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールを浄化すると、お前に約束した。そしてその約束は守った。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}お前の支持{/d}のお陰で、ステーションは再び帝国の前哨基地となり、勤勉と正義の純粋なる砦となるだろう。逆らおうとした異端者は、最後の一人まで全滅させた」

languages.text: «Le prometí hacer una limpieza en Paso y he cumplido mi palabra. Gracias a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}su apoyo{/d}, la estación pronto volverá a ser un puesto avanzado del Imperium, un bastión de pureza, industria y justicia, y los herejes que osaron desafiarme ya casi han sido erradicados por completo».
languages.original_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

traits.locale_text: «Le prometí hacer una limpieza en Paso y he cumplido mi palabra. Gracias a su apoyo, la estación pronto volverá a ser un puesto avanzado del Imperium, un bastión de pureza, industria y justicia, y los herejes que osaron desafiarme ya casi han sido erradicados por completo».

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch versprochen auf Footfall aufzuräumen, und ich habe Wort gehalten. Dank {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}Eurer Unterstützung{/d} wird die Station erneut ein Außenposten des Imperiums sein ... eine geläuterte Bastion der Arbeitsamkeit und Rechtschaffenheit. Die Ketzer, die es gewagt hatten, sich mir zu widersetzen, wurden nahezu restlos ausgelöscht."
languages.original_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch versprochen, dass ich auf Footfall aufräumen würde, und ich habe Wort gehalten. Dank Eurer Unterstützung steht die Station seit langem unter meiner strikten Kontrolle, und die Ketzer, die es gewagt hatten, sich mir zu widersetzen, wurden nahezu restlos ausgelöscht."

"Ich habe Euch versprochen auf Footfall aufzuräumen, und ich habe Wort gehalten. Dank Eurer Unterstützung wird die Station erneut ein Außenposten des Imperiums sein ... eine geläuterte Bastion der Arbeitsamkeit und Rechtschaffenheit. Die Ketzer, die es gewagt hatten, sich mir zu widersetzen, wurden nahezu restlos ausgelöscht."

languages.text: « Je vous avais promis de purger Castel et j'ai tenu parole. Grâce à {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}votre aide{/d}, la station redeviendra un avant-poste de l'Imperium, un bastion purifié de zèle et de vertu. Les hérétiques qui ont osé me défier ont presque tous été éliminés. »
languages.original_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous avais promis de purger Castel et j'ai tenu parole. Grâce à votre aide, la station redeviendra un avant-poste de l'Imperium, un bastion purifié de zèle et de vertu. Les hérétiques qui ont osé me défier ont presque tous été éliminés. »

languages.text: "Binliman'ı arındıracağıma söz vermiştim, sözümü de tuttum. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}Senin de desteğinle{/d} istasyon, yeniden İmparatorluk'a ait bir karakol olarak doğruluğun ve çalışkanlığın temiz bir yuvası hâline gelecektir. Bana karşı gelme cüretini gösteren kâfirler de yok olmaya yüz tuttu."
languages.original_text: "I promised you that I would clean up Footfall, and I have kept my promise. By virtue of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}your support{/d}, the station will once again be an outpost of the Imperium — a purified bastion of industriousness and righteousness. The heretics who dared defy me have nearly been eradicated to the last."
